pageContent: Background: An elevated risk of suicide after a diagnosis of prostate cancer has been reported previously in the USA and Sweden. We aimed to identify whether prostate cancer survivors resident in New South Wales Australia are at higher risk of suicide and if so, who is most at risk.

metaData.source:
An Algorithm to Personalize Nerve Sparing in Men With Unilateral High-risk Prostate Cancer. Reply
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36367401/
